Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It helped me solves doubts which teacher wasn't able to in terms of different assignment or lectures notes

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Yes, I always felt that teachers were helpful but they always had limitations  as to what they can help with and so hard to get their appointments however with GenAI it was always much faster and hence felt more supported.
